short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.
